==Trivia==
* The name of this skill alludes to {{lang|''{{w|Kiku-ichimonji}}''|ja=菊一文字}}, a famous line of Japanese swords from the Kamakura period. They were traditionally inscribed with only the character {{ja|一|ichi|one,}} giving rise to their common name.
